game.name: Succumate
game.shortDescription: From the creator of Summer Memories comes a new game where you must look after a demon named Lilim! Now you must juggle your time to keep her happy... or else!
game.shortDescriptionEn: From the creator of Summer Memories comes a new game where you must look after a demon named Lilim! Now you must juggle your time to keep her happy... or else!

reviewHighlights.text: Forget the succubus - this is a life simulator. You walk around and have to constantly eat and sleep. The "working as a waiter" minigame I just found...
